I am a skilled data professional with over 5 years of experience in public health, renewable energy, WASH, climate action, and clinical trials.

Having a B.Sc. in Applied Statistics with Computing, I have worked as a Data Analyst, Statistician, Statistical Trainer, Data Manager, and currently as an FSP Data Configurations Engineer.
